thread.title: Lisa Gargaro
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Lisa Gargaro

author: Lisa Gargaro
title: Lisa Gargaro
text: Love this company, the website is user friendly & quick and easy to find what you are looking for. Delivery options 7 days which is brilliant, and always have great choice of flowers & extras you may wish to send too. The flowers have alway got a great lifespan too. I WONT be using anyone else for my flowers. :)
